testcase.name: Event Manager monitoring a room and send urgent message to server if needed
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Event Manager monitoring a room and send urgent message to server if needed Given an AI in syringe pump ... passed in 0.001s And the event manager ... passed in 0.003s When a device of the room enter into a critical state ... passed in 0.001s Then AI in syringe pump should send urgent message to server ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Event Manager monitoring a room and send urgent message to server if needed (2)
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Event Manager monitoring a room and send urgent message to server if needed (2) Given an AI in syringe pump ... passed in 0.001s And the event manager ... passed in 0.002s When a device enter into a critical state during calculation ... passed in 0.020s Then AI in syringe pump should send urgent message to server ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Server send "ON" messages with specific root on urgent demands
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Server send "ON" messages with specific root on urgent demands Given a server interacting with AI agents in syringe pump ... passed in 0.002s And an mqtt server interacting with AI agents in syringe pump ... passed in 0.004s When receive an 'URGT' message from AI in syringe pump ... passed in 0.002s Then server should send 'ON' messages to every AI in syringe pump ... passed in 0.022s And should choose the sender of the 'URGT' message as root ... passed in 0.019s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Server take care of urgent messages
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Server take care of urgent messages Given a server interacting with AI agents in syringe pump ... passed in 0.002s And an mqtt server interacting with AI agents in syringe pump ... passed in 0.002s When receive an 'URGT' message from AI in syringe pump ... passed in 0.002s Then server should give biggest priority to urgent agent and set next passage in 0 mins ... passed in 0.024s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
